column2: illustrator=Edouard Kloczko (front cover), [[Arden R. Smith]] (back cover)

column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''8''' is the eigth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
* "Essitalmar: Place-names of Beleriand" (column, with fold-out map) — [[Tom Loback]].

* "Transitions in Translations"<ref>Contents of the column: "The Portuguese Gnome", "Is Watership Down in the Shire?", "Remarks on the Russian ''Fellowship''", "Trivia Question".</ref> (column) — edited by [[Arden R. Smith]].
* "The Rime of the Ancient Philologer" — [[Paul Nolan Hyde]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
